title: HOW DAFAQ AM I SUPPOSED TO RANK UP WHEN IM PLAYING WITH PEOPLE WHO ARE FAR BEHIND APES??!?!?!?!?!?!
body:
PLAYING 9312849012734089127401234812 MATCHES IN ROW LOSTING  9312849012734089127401234812 IN ROW. IF I GO TOP THEN MID IS TROLLING, IF I GO MID THEN BOT IS STONE AGE ELO WATER DIVISION 91919191 AND ULTRA FEEEEEDING AND IF I GO BOT JUNGLER IS FARMING AND ONLY FARMING AND SPAMMING 'wtf this bronze elo kids,kiddo, idc about this game' AND WHEN I GO JUNGLE ITS REPORT JUNGLER (because i cant bbysit) LIKE WATAFAK IS WRONG WITH PEOPLE??? 
IF YOU WANNA LEARN TO PLAY LEAGUE, GO TUTORIAL, START TUTORIAL AND LEARN!!!! DONT COME TO RANKED WITH 0 BRAIN. 
Hope riot will notice this and do something about people on EuNe because these amazon people are going wild.
I apologize to ape kind.

replies.body: Because if you are playing with apes, you are playing against ape and you are not ape: you should be climbing.

Welp, I have heard from a gold player that reached plat and regretted it,so toxic and miserable up there saying thought it'd be fun and nicer in the elo but it turns out they still are easily tilted, not because they don't know how to play their champ, but because they don't have the macro (game sense knowledge) that  diamond has and still blaming others for their actions.
Alright, 0 attack speed quints is a no go for the jg, you need it for champs like{{champion:11}}  as early game 15% AS is amazing,also take savagery instead of full wanderers for the fast clear speed, you take first blood over feast even though you took full vampirism and bought 3 health pots not accounting for your amazing sustain of meditate? Also I think you should take dangerous game because of your low base mana with high mana costs so you can q again.Master yi's not hard, it won't reach challenger I can tell ya that, People tried and everyone knows what to do against yi in diamond+.
Be aware that you are still close to  the threshhold of 1500 mmr, for new unranked players, a lvl 30 got into your game with 3 games only played and was your  adc against diamond plats.
